mapper.sql: SELECT auth_rent_user.id , auth_rent_user.salesId, auth_rent_user.clientKey, auth_rent_user.category, auth_rent_user.mac, auth_rent_user.firstName, auth_rent_user.lastName, auth_rent_user.email, auth_rent_user.phone, auth_rent_user.createTime, auth_rent_user.activateTime, auth_rent_user.status, auth_rent_user.country, auth_rent_user.region, auth_rent_user.city, auth_rent_user.timeZone, auth_rent_user.lastOnLineTime, auth_sales.username salesName FROM auth_rent_user JOIN auth_sales ON auth_rent_user.salesId = auth_sales.id
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM auth_rent_user WHERE mac=#{mac}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM auth_rent_user WHERE email=#{email}
SELECT status FROM auth_rent_user WHERE mac=#{mac}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auth_rent_user (salesId, clientKey, category, mac, firstName, lastName, email, phone) VALUES (#{salesId}, #{clientKey}, #{category}, #{mac}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT id, salesId, clientKey, category, mac, firstName ,lastName, email, phone, createTime, activateTime, status FROM auth_rent_user WHERE clientKey=#{_parameter}
